title: Ultimate Highlights: Carver vs. Park Crossing (Crosstown Showdown)
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Ultimate Highlights: Carver vs. Park Crossing (Crosstown Showdown) Thunderbirds take down Wolverines for a second straight year in just their second year as a football program. Join the Conversation Duane Rankin , Montgomery Advertiser 5:05 p.m. CDT October 10, 2015 Buy Photo 
Park Crossing celebrates winning the Crosstown Showdown over G.W. Carver on Friday night at Cramton Bowl. (Photo: Shannon Heupel/Montgomery Advertiser) 
Get comfortable. 
Real comfortable. 
Park Crossing and G.W. Carver put on a show in Friday night's Crosstown Showdown at Cramton Bowl. In the end, the Thunderbirds (7-1, 5-0) pulled out a 48-27 victory over the Wolverines (3-3, 3-2) as junior quarterback Malik Cunningham threw four touchdowns and ran for another in the Class 6A, Region 2 win. Park Crossing pulled out a 48-27 victory Friday night over G.W. Carver at Cramton Bowl. Duane Rankin/Montgomery Advertiser Park Crossingâ€™s former Carver stars get win vs old team 
So sit back, relax and check out 10-plus minutes of highlights from both teams, their fans, their bands and more. Got the big plays, big hits and big moments in what is becoming the high school game of the year in the city of Montgomery. Read or Share this story: http://on.mgmadv.com/1LolHCr Most Popular
